attributes.action: Act urgently on the proposed referendum rule in respect of the 23rd June vote.
attributes.additional_details:
The Scots and others feel deceived. The opposite numbers in European governments need and deserve an quick end to the question 'what are we going to do now?"
We really don't know and no one in power is telling us.
The result was unsatisfactory for 48% of voters and many more who didn't.
attributes.background: The proposition in the HUGELY supported referendum rule change leaves open the possibility for the government to apply only to future votes. This matter is URGENT and the needs not only of British Citizens but the turmoil in Europe and the world should be resolved in a prompt responsible manner
